posts.post_content: If you want to buy some low grade commons, I got a bunch ranging from poor to vg, mostly common backs. The better cards from the lot with eventually be listed separately. Let me know if you're interested in a group purchase before I end up listing them all individually. You could give me a grade preference and I can put together a lot for you. If you're looking for a specific team, I can put those together too. The more you take the better the price

Hey, was wondering if you have any PSA-graded cards in the 2 to 4 range.  Also looking for SLers with Old Mill backs and rarer backs  Thanks.

Marty
PM sent regarding a potential pile o' cards.:)
SOLD SOLD SOLD, he bought it!

I would like the ugly 19.  Please pm me your paypal info.  Thanks
Dave
